text: 13.9 Kis 20.13-17, Wkp 19.18, Lo 5.17-21 Chɨn nopun, takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak anɨgɨl agak, Bin si bɨ si ma gɨnɨmɨn, chɨp ma ñagɨnɨmɨn, tap si ma dɨnɨmɨn, binɨb ogɨnap tap kɨlop okok yɨp tek yobɨkop agɨl ma nɨgɨnɨmɨn agak. Pen takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak anɨb ak sek, takaw kɨles adek agɨlak ak sek, ñu kɨl tɨkɨlak anɨb okok mɨdupsek, jɨj ne ak takaw nokom olap mɨdeb. Takaw anɨb ak anɨgɨl agak, Binɨb ogɨnap kɨlop, nad ke mapen lɨpan tek gɨnɨmɨn agak.
